short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Cài đặt Tìm kiếm Cốc Cốc ngay hôm nay và trải nghiệm công cụ tìm kiếm dành cho người Việt!
short.en: Install Cốc Cốc Search now and experience the search engine for Vietnamese people!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets your default search engine and new tab page to Cốc Cốc, allowing you to search for information more conveniently and surf the web with more inspiration:
• Get quicker and more relatable search results in Vietnamese.
• Enjoy smart search with AI Chat and AI Search assistant.
• Show or hide, edit shortcuts on the new tab page as you like.
• Personalize the new tab page with curated background images of beautiful Vietnam or with your uploaded background image.
• Earn points - exchange gifts with Cốc Cốc Points when using our search features.

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

The biggest advantage of Cốc Cốc Search is Vertical search features specially designed for Vietnamese people. When users query certain groups of local topics (such as weather, football, flight, cinema, or general education lectures), Cốc Cốc Search will provide filters for users to customize their search.

The list of verticals that Cốc Cốc supports includes:
➤ Information lookup:
• AI Chat: Find answers to any topics, create content and perform language-related tasks such as summarizing, translating text and more.
• Finance: Convert fiat currencies, crypto currencies and see exchange rate history. Look up bank savings interest rates and gold prices, petrol prices. Get updates on Vietnam's stock market indexes, stock prices and news about stock issuers.
• eGovernment: Quickly look up information on the National Public Service Portal, including instructions for citizens and businesses on administrative procedures, public services and online payments.
• Jobs: Quickly search for job opportunities, CV templates. View office life handbook and research salary range by job position and location. Calculate Gross - Net salary and personal income tax.
• Lunar calendar: See date and time according to the lunar calendar. See prayer speeches for feast days, Tet holidays.
• Lunar horoscope: See horoscope according to animal signs for an overview of work, love, health and fortune in the whole year.
• Zodiac horoscope: See horoscope according to astrological signs for some hints on health, family, career and love in the whole year.
• Lottery: Update lottery results in Vietnam, including 3 regional lotteries and Vietlott lottery.
➤ Education:
• Homework solver: Answer keys with detailed explanation to exercises in textbooks and reference books of the general education program.
• Video tutor: Online video lectures for school students.
• Math: Solve high school math exercises with detailed solutions.
• Chemistry: Solve high school chemistry exercises with detailed solutions.
• Unit converter: Convert measurement units used in Mathematics, Physics and daily life.
• Translate: Translate text in 80 different languages.
• Dictionary: Look up English - Vietnamese dictionary for pronunciation, definitions, examples and common grammatical structures.
• Vietnamese spell checker: Suggestions for spelling correction with detailed explanations.
• University hub: Look up information about career and majors, entrance scores and enrollment programs of Universities and Colleges in Vietnam.
• Graduation grades: Look up the scores of the National High School Graduation Examination by candidate ID and score spectrums over the years.
• Materials for exam preparation: Sets of sample tests for 15 subjects in National High School Graduation Examination over the years with detailed answer keys.
➤ Travel and entertainment:
• Weather: View weather forecast for the next 14 days with indexes such as temperature, humidity, chance of rain, and air quality.
• Football: Find links to watch online football matches, see match timeline, match schedules and standings of ongoing tournaments.
• Anime: Find links to watch anime online by release status, genre, season and production year. 
• Manga: Find links to read manga online by comic name, release status, genre and language.
• Flights: Find flight tickets based on information about departure, destination, flight date, flight class, flight type.
• Hotels: Find hotels by destination, number of guests and staying time. Easily select the best accomodation by review ratings, price range, distance to the center and facilities.
• Restaurants: Find restaurants by location, cuisine, review ratings, occasion and facilities. View photos, detailed reviews, restaurant information and menu.
• Recipe: Search over 350,000 recipes by course menu, ingredients and cooking methods.
• Movie: Find movie information, links to watch online and torrent download links of thousands of movies and series.
• Cinema: Find now showing movies, upcoming movies, showtimes and promotional movie tickets at the nearest cinemas.
Besides exclusive Vertical search features, Cốc Cốc Search also brings you reliable information filtering solutions.

➤ AI Search: Get more relevant search results summarized by AI on how-to queries. Save time with more concise answer right at the top of the search result page.

➤ Safe search: When this feature is enabled, text, images, and videos containing 18+ content will be filtered out of Cốc Cốc's search results page.

➤ Verify website: Identify official website of a company, organization or brand thanks to the green tick icon next to the URL on search results page.

Install Cốc Cốc Search now and experience!
